com.abbyy.mobile.rtr

Interface IRecognitionCoreAPI


  • public interface IRecognitionCoreAPI
    Provides access to low-level single image core API functions for current thread. Should be used on the same thread on which it was created. Multiple objects can be created on different threads and used concurrently. All methods are synchronous (blocking) and should not be used on UI thread. For advanced users.

      The TextBlock is a collection of lines of recognized text.

      The TextLine represents a recognized text line.
      static interface  IRecognitionCoreAPI.TextRecognitionCallback
      Callback for text recognition methods.

      Settings for text recognition.
      static class  IRecognitionCoreAPI.TranslationResult
      The TranslationResult represents a translated text and mapping.

      Warnings

    • Method Detail

      • recognizeText

        IRecognitionCoreAPI.TextBlock[] recognizeText(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                                              IRecognitionCoreAPI.TextRecognitionCallback callback)
        Recognize text on a still image. see getTextRecognitionSettings below
        Parameters:
        image - Image to recognize.
        callback - Implementation of the TextRecognitionCallback interface. Is called during the recognition to track the recognition progress and interrupt processing if required.
        Returns:
        an array of TextBlock objects.

      • translate

        IRecognitionCoreAPI.TranslationResult translate(java.lang.String text)
                                         throws Engine.LicenseException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. Translate the input string. Non-translatable substrings are returned as is.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to translate.
        Returns:
        a translated string.
        Throws:
        Engine.LicenseException
        java.io.IOException

      • setTranslationDictionary

        void setTranslationDictionary(java.lang.String dictionaryName)
        Sets the name of the translation dictionary.

        By default, no translation dictionary is used. Translation dictionaries should be put in the 'assets\translation' folder.

        Parameters:
        dictionaryName - the name of the translation dictionary file without extension

      • close

        void close()
        Release all resources.

        IRecognitionCoreAPI.ExtendedSettings getExtendedSettings()

        extended service configuration settings
